vulnerability_findings.name: arbitrary-send
vulnerability_findings.message:
B.go (patch_4.sol#10-18) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- owner.transfer(address(this).balance) (patch_4.sol#17)

vulnerability_findings.name: external-function
low-level-calls
vulnerability_findings.message:
Low level call in B.go (patch_4.sol#10-18):
	-success = _target.call.value(msg.value)() patch_4.sol#14

vulnerability_findings.name: naming-convention
vulnerability_findings.message: Parameter '_target' of B.go (patch_4.sol#10) is not in mixedCase
